# Construction
The [color=cyan]construction menu[/color] is how you build and craft objects in the game. It can be accessed by pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenCraftingMenu"][/bold][/color] or by clicking its button on the interface.
### Grid Placement When placing objects that "snap" to the grid, hold [color=yellow][bold][keybind="EditorLinePlace"][/bold][/color] to place an entire [color=cyan]line[/color] at a time, and [color=yellow][bold][keybind="EditorGridPlace"][/bold][/color] to place an entire [color=cyan]grid[/color] at a time.
### Ingredients When crafting objects with a lot of ingredients, keep in mind you don't have to hold everything at once; you can simply place the ingredients on the floor, in your backpack or on a table near you, and they'll be used up during crafting like normal.
### Rotating
### Flipping Some objects are flippable, such as Gas Mixers and Filters. [color=yellow][bold][keybind="EditorRotateObject"][/bold][/color] rotates construction ghosts clockwise. \n[color=yellow][bold][keybind="EditorFlipObject"][/bold][/color] flips them.
### In-world Building [color=yellow][bold][keybind="RotateObjectClockwise"][/bold][/color] rotates unanchored (unwrenched) objects clockwise. \n[color=yellow][bold][keybind="RotateObjectCounterclockwise"][/bold][/color] rotates them counterclockwise. \n[color=yellow][bold][keybind="FlipObject"][/bold][/color] flips them.
